009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
016import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
017import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
018import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
019
020public class Map_Twirl implements PlugInFilter {
021        
022        static double alpha = Math.toRadians(43.0);     // angle (43 degrees)
023
024        @Override
025        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
026                return DOES_ALL;
027        }
028
029        @Override
030        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
031                final double xc = 0.5 * ip.getWidth();
032                final double yc = 0.5 * ip.getHeight();
033                final double rmax = Math.sqrt(xc * xc + yc * yc);
034                
035                Mapping2D imap = new Mapping2D() {      // inverse mapping (target to source)
036                        @Override
037                        public Pnt2d applyTo(Pnt2d uv) {
038                                double dx = uv.getX() - xc;
039                                double dy = uv.getY() - yc;
040                                double r = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
041                                if (r < rmax) {
042                                        double beta = Math.atan2(dy, dx) + alpha * (rmax - r) / rmax;
043                                        double x = xc + r * Math.cos(beta);
044                                        double y = yc + r * Math.sin(beta);
045                                        return Pnt2d.from(x, y);
046                                }
047                                else {
048                                        return uv;      // return the original point
049                                }
050                        }
051                };
052                
053                new ImageMapper(imap, OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic).map(ip);
054        }
055        
056}
